title: Audit Dogs
description: There are 1,500 IRS agents in the state of Virginia. These are their stories.
quote: The numbers! The answer is always the numbers!
altHero: Stan Matthews as an IRS agent
alt2: the Stans driving in a car with a blown out windshield
alt3: financial calculator that spells “BOOBS” with numbers
alt4: the Stans talking to a snake sitting in a rocking chair
